summary.span: 包含 Soapsuds 工具 (Soapsuds.exe) 命令行工具使用的类，以及用于将元数据与远程处理基础结构的 XML 架构相互转换的用户代码。

span.span: Contains the classes that are used by the Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe) command-line tool and the user code to convert metadata to and from XML schema for the remoting infrastructure.

summary.span: 此命名空间的一些最重要的类是 类和 类。

span.span: Some of the most important classes of this namespace are the class and the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 远程处理基础结构使用类在服务器端 (WSDL) 生成 Web 服务描述语言。The class is used by the remoting infrastructure to generate Web Services Description Language (WSDL) on the server side. 类提供[Soapsuds 工具的功能 ( # A0) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100))命令行工具，可通过编程方式使用以获得相同的结果。The class provides the functionality of the [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100)) command-line tool, and can be used programmatically to achieve the same outcome. 类的方法 可用于创建 xml 架构，该架构描述源代码中公开的服务，以及从 XML 架构创建 c # 代码。The methods of the class can be used to create XML schemas that describe services that are exposed in source code, and to create C# code from XML schema.
